name: 蕭榮修
objective:
瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１. 抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２. 靜態結構及其儲存法，３. 遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４. 佇列，５. 串列、鏈結串列，６. 樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７. 圖形，８. 排序，９. 搜尋、雜湊。
This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming, including: (1) the concept of ADT (abstract data type) and C++ programming language, (2) static structures and their storage representations, array and linked lists (3) computational complexity, (4) recursion, stacks, and prefix, infix, and postfix expressions, (5) queues, (6) lists and linked lists, (7) trees, tree traversal algorithms, and binary trees, (8) heaps and priority queues, (9) soring, searching and hashing, (10) graphs.
schedule:
1.	Introduction
2.	C++ and Object-Oriented Programming
3.	No Class (9/29 中秋節)
4.	Array and Linked Lists
5.	Analysis of Algorithms
6.	Stacks
7.	Queues
8.	Vector, List and Sequence
9.	Mid-term Exam
10.	Trees_I
11.	Trees_II
12.	Heaps and Priority Queues
13.	Hash Tables, Maps, and Skip Lists
14.	Search Trees
15.	Sorting, Sets, and Selection
16.	Graph Algorithms_I
17.	Graph Algorithms_II
18.	Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Grading:
   10% Attendance
   30% Assignments and Quizzes
   30% Mid-term Exam
   30% Final Exam

2. Robert Lafore, Teach Yourself Data Structures and Algorithms in 24 hours, Sams Publishing, 1999. (ISBN 0-67231-633-1)
3. Ellis Horowitz, Sartaj Sahni, and Susan Anderson-Freed, Fundamentals of Data Structures in C, 2nd Edition, Silicon Press, 2008. (ISBN 9780929306407)
